Rooms.Name: atrium
Rooms.Description: A neon atrium humming with static.
Rooms.LongDescription: A neon atrium hums with static, light strips pulsing beneath translucent floors while holo-ads ripple across glass walls.
Rooms.ExitText: You slide out of the atrium.

Rooms.Name: side-room
Rooms.Description: A pocket cafe of CRTs and cracked tiles.
Rooms.LongDescription: A pocket cafe lined with humming CRTs and cracked ceramic tiles. A synth-coffee machine wheezes near stacks of neon zines.
Rooms.ExitText: You step out of the side-room.

Rooms.Name: closet
Rooms.Description: A cramped cache full of forgotten gear.
Rooms.LongDescription: A cramped cache perfumed with dust and ozone. Shelves bow under piles of coiled cables, badge printers, and translucent floppies.

Rooms.Name: dark world
Rooms.Description: A secret void of humming servers.
Rooms.LongDescription: A secret void behind the closet, lit only by status LEDs that trace out horizon lines. The hum is felt more than heard.
Rooms.EnterText: You cross over into the dark world.
Rooms.ExitText: You slip away from the dark world.

Rooms.Name: fiber hall
Rooms.Description: A corridor of glass fibers and scrolling glyphs.
Rooms.LongDescription: A vaulted corridor where fiber bundles twist overhead like vines. Scrolling green glyphs run along the floor edges, whispering coordinates.
Rooms.EnterText: You stride into the fiber hall.
Rooms.ExitText: You slip out of the fiber hall.

Rooms.Name: glitch market
Rooms.Description: An arcade flooded with pixelated stalls.
Rooms.LongDescription: Vendors float on hovering platforms, their stalls flickering like broken sprites. The air smells like solder and artificial bubblegum.
Rooms.EnterText: You drift into the glitch market.
Rooms.ExitText: You fade from the glitch market.

Rooms.Name: holo garden
Rooms.Description: A meadow of light, compiled on demand.
Rooms.LongDescription: Projected grass waves beneath your feet while translucent trees render and unrender with every breeze. Firefly-sized pixels blink above a slow data stream.
Rooms.EnterText: You step into the holo garden.

Rooms.Name: server overlook
Rooms.LongDescription: You stand on a catwalk above servers stacked like city blocks. Cooling mist drifts upward, bending rainbow lasers that map traffic flows.
Rooms.EnterText: You climb up to the server overlook.
Rooms.ExitText: You descend from the server overlook.

Rooms.Name: debug sanctum
Rooms.Description: A quiet chamber of syntax and incense.
Rooms.LongDescription: Blank walls are overlaid with floating code traces that respond to your breath. Incense coils spiral around a central console that glows steady amber.
Rooms.EnterText: You slip into the debug sanctum.
Rooms.ExitText: You back away from the debug sanctum.

Objects.Name: notice board
Objects.Description: A wooden board patched with neon paper.
Objects.TextContent: Welcome to MooSharp. Mind the static and leave a note for the next traveler.

Objects.Name: holographic kiosk
Objects.Description: A holo kiosk that cycles through retro net-maps and safety tips.
Objects.TextContent: Navigate with verbs, explore with curiosity. The network remembers everything.

Objects.Name: synth coffee tin
Objects.Description: A dented tin of synth coffee grounds, smelling faintly of ozone and caramel.
Objects.TextContent: Brew instructions: add water, whisper a URL, stir counterclockwise.

Objects.Name: lanyard full of keycards
Objects.Description: A loop of laminated keycards, each printed with faded barcodes and scribbled handles.

Objects.Name: console of lingering logs
Objects.Description: A waist-high console scrolling logs from forgotten sessions, ready for a new entry.

Objects.Name: fiber vine
Objects.Description: A thick bundle of glowing fiber lines braided into a sculptural arch.

Objects.Name: vendor drone
Objects.Description: A chrome drone hawking shareware trinkets, its voice modulating between radio announcer and dial-up tones.

Objects.Name: pixel blossom
Objects.Description: A translucent flower that renders new petals every few seconds before deleting the old ones.

Objects.Name: traffic scope
Objects.Description: A handheld scope that paints arcs of live data traffic when you peer through it.

Objects.Name: amber console
Objects.Description: A low altar-like console with a single amber prompt inviting careful commands.
Objects.TextContent: run: breathe; debug: self; commit: kindness;
